description: Back-formation from commentator. Equivalent to comment +â€Ž -ate.

verbs.description: commentate (third-person singular simple present commentates, present participle commentating, simple past and past participle commentated)

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To provide a commentary; to act as a commentator; to maintain a stream of comments about some event.
examples: For the radio audience he will commentate on the match.
